config_iog_slots.title: Configure IOG-Ohme Slots
config_iog_slots.description: To track IOG 'active charging' when using Ohme, useful for knowing when your Ohme charger has activated Octopuses cheaper household rate. Uses Ohme Integration, or any sensor with a power W/kW unit of measure (Smart plug, shelly, R4850g2 etc)

data.charge_mode_value: Charge mode value for smart charging

data_description.name_prefix: Prefix for all created entities (e.g., 'IOG' creates 'IOG Active Charging Duration Slot 00')
data_description.enable_charge_mode_check: When enabled, checks if charge mode matches the specified value. Requires Ohme Integration. Disable if you only want to track power.
data_description.charge_mode_entity: Select entity that controls charge mode (e.g., select.ohme_home_pro_charge_mode)
data_description.charge_mode_value: Value that indicates smart charging mode (e.g., 'smart_charge', 'Smart Charge')
data_description.power_entity: Power sensor that measures charging power (must use W or kW units) *MUST* be powered by the Ohme charger.
data_description.power_threshold: Minimum power in watts to consider charging active (e.g., 1700W)
data_description.activation_threshold: Minutes of charging required to activate the cheap slot (e.g., 5 minutes)
data_description.update_interval: How often to update sensor states (10-30 seconds recommended)
